game.name: Bonez
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases, Stats
game.shortDescription: Embark on a spectral quest where the clattering of bones reveals a legendary card game. This is not just a gamble; it's a quest to seek victory through strategic wits without succumbing to the haunting specters of defeat. Join the bone-rattling duel of fate & strategy & take your place at the top.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a spectral quest where the clattering of bones reveals a legendary card game. This is not just a gamble; it's a quest to seek victory through strategic wits without succumbing to the haunting specters of defeat. Join the bone-rattling duel of fate & strategy & take your place at the top.
